edu.luc.cs.fms.model.maintenance

Class ConcreteMaintenance

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.luc.cs.fms.model.maintenance.ConcreteMaintenance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Maintenance

    public class ConcreteMaintenance
extends java.lang.Object
implements Maintenance
    This class is the interface between the client and the domain model for the maintenance objects.
    Author:
    TeamDK
